Name: Thriller From Vanilla
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Orange and creamy vanilla fortified with a hint of gin.
History: Adapted from a drink discovered in 2003 at Oporto, Leeds, England. The "Thriller in Manila" was what the 1975 heavyweight fight between Muhammad Ali and Smokin' Joe Frazier became known as.
Nutrition: One serving of Thriller From Vanilla contains 161 calories
